<denchmark-h:h2>Lack of details on criteria flags in the documentation of KMeans algorithm</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Referring to : http://docs.opencv.org/modules/core/doc/clustering.html#kmeans
It is not mentioned on the format or how to define the criteria (especially in Python version, which is defined as a tuple *(criteria_flag,iteration,accuracy)* ).
And there is no mentioning criteria flags like *TERM_CRITERIA_MAX_ITER, TERM_CRITERIA_EPS, TERM_CRITERIA_COUNT* etc.
And some parameters, there is a change in naming, but doesn't say they are same.
eg : K and nclusters in Python both cv2.kmeans and cv.KMeans2, retval and compactness </denchmark-code>
